### Suggested citation

If you use this project for academic work, here is a suggested citation.

Lincoln Mullen, *America's Public Bible: A Commentary* (Stanford University Press, 2020): &lt;<http://americaspublicbible.org>&gt;.

### Project news 

**January 4, 2018**: This site was presented in a paper titled "How 19th-Century Americans Quoted Their Bibles" for the panel "[The Digital History of 19th-Century U.S. Religion](https://aha.confex.com/aha/2018/webprogram/Session16441.html)," co-sponsored by the American Society of Church History and the American Historical Association.

**February 27, 2017**: A much expanded version of this site will be published as a digital monograph by Stanford University Press.

**July 25, 2016**: This project won [first place](https://www.neh.gov/news/press-release/2016-07-25) in the National Endowment for the Humanities' Chronicling America Data Challenge.

**June 13, 2016**: Initial release of the website and data.
